nodes.text: Braata was one of the Four Sages of Dwartii, ancient controversial philosophers and lawgivers of the Galactic Republic. The other three Sages were Sistros, Yanjon and Faya. Braata encouraged the study of the dark side.

In the now defunct MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies, all four statues of the Sages of Dwartii could be collected. However, the statue that was labeled as Braata's in Galaxies was identified as Sistros' effigy by both Star Wars: Revenge of the Sith: The Visual Dictionary and the bronze statues set "Sistros and Braata" produced by Sideshow Collectibles. Leland Chee, administrator of the Holocron continuity database at Lucasfilm Ltd., later stated that the Sideshow identification was correct.
